00028 #include "qf_pkg.h"
00029 #include "qassert.h"
00030 
00031 Q_DEFINE_THIS_MODULE(qf_new)
00032 
00033 
00039 /*..........................................................................*/
00040 QEvent *QF_new_(QEventSize evtSize, QSignal sig) {
00041     QEvent *e;
00042     QS_INT_LOCK_KEY_
00043 
00044               /* find the pool index that fits the requested event size ... */
00045     uint8_t idx = (uint8_t)0;
00046     while (evtSize > QF_EPOOL_EVENT_SIZE_(QF_pool_[idx])) {
00047         ++idx;
00048         Q_ASSERT(idx < QF_maxPool_);  /* cannot run out of registered pools */
00049     }
00050 
00051     QS_BEGIN_(QS_QF_NEW, (void *)0, (void *)0)
00052         QS_TIME_();                                            /* timestamp */
00053         QS_EVS_(evtSize);                          /* the size of the event */
00054         QS_SIG_(sig);                            /* the signal of the event */
00055     QS_END_()
00056 
00057     QF_EPOOL_GET_(QF_pool_[idx], e);         /* get e -- platform-dependent */
00058     Q_ASSERT(e != (QEvent *)0);          /* pool must not run out of events */
00059 
00060     e->sig = sig;                              /* set signal for this event */
00061 
00062                                  /* store the dynamic attributes of the event:
00063                                  * the pool ID and the reference counter == 0
00064                                  */
00065     e->dynamic_ = (uint8_t)((idx + 1) << 6);
00066     return e;
00067 }
